channel.title: Server problems :(
channel.description: I am the only one who can get on my server and it's by using my IP for the router. Other people were allowed on before but now I can't seem to fix it. I compiled and restarted and everything but nothing works. And the no-ip actually worked too. I changed my port forwarding info and then it worked, but I never changed it and now it doesn't. Hmmm..any help please? :|

item.title: Server problems :(
item.dc:creator: @Dvs_Chick Dvs Chick
item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

Mine is not wireless, it has a USB cable that gives me my internet. Also I tried to Compile and this is what it says "#

An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment:

Internal Error (exceptions.cpp:367), pid=3832, tid=1012

Error: ExceptionMark destructor expects no pending exceptions

Java VM: Java HotSpot™ Client VM (11.0-b15 mixed mode, sharing windows-x86)

An error report file with more information is saved as:

C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Desktop\OldkoScape Server\hs_err_pid3832.log

If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp

Finished!
Press any key to continue . . ."

And my IP did not change as you suggested above.

Read full topic

item.title: Server problems :(
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

if you have a wireless router, everytime you pull the plug (a.k.a. restart it) your static IP changes, check it with the Ip you’ve in your Router’s portforwarding page

Read full topic

item.title: Server problems :(
item.dc:creator: @Dvs_Chick Dvs Chick
item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

I am the only one who can get on my server and it’s by using my IP for the router. Other people were allowed on before but now I can’t seem to fix it. I compiled and restarted and everything but nothing works. And the no-ip actually worked too. I changed my port forwarding info and then it worked, but I never changed it and now it doesn’t. Hmmm…any help please?
